description: A deployable architecture for instant 'vibe coding' — paste or upload your HTML to IBM Cloud Object Storage and watch it go live instantly.

variables.name: resource_group
variables.description: Where your vibe lives organizationally. If unsure, 'default' is fine.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region for your Object Storage bucket. 'us-south' is a steady classic.

variables.name: cos_instance_name
variables.description: A friendly name for your IBM Cloud Object Storage instance.

variables.name: bucket_name
variables.description: Your public bucket name (lowercase, no spaces). This becomes your vibe’s home in the cloud.

variables.name: index_html
variables.description: Paste your full HTML here — it becomes your app’s index.html when deployed. No escaping needed; just vibes.

variables.name: index_html_file
variables.description: Optional path to a local HTML file (e.g., index.html). Used only if the textarea above is empty.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_url
outputs.description: Direct link to your Vibe Bucket for browsing or verification.
